mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cg_order( order_id, total_amount, freight_amount, order_time, customer_id, payment_type, status, remark ) VALUES ( #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freightAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paymentType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cg_order WHERE order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM cg_order WHERE order_id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.total_amount totalAmount, a.freight_amount freightAmount, DATE_FORMAT(a.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') orderTime, a.customer_id customerId, a.payment_type paymentType, a.status status, a.remark remark FROM cg_order a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.total_amount totalAmount, a.freight_amount freightAmount, DATE_FORMAT(a.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') orderTime, a.customer_id customerId, a.payment_type paymentType, a.status status, a.remark remark FROM cg_order a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.order_id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM cg_order a WHERE 1=1
